name: Hook A Duck - Arcade Game
description:
Hook The Duck is a fun Duck catching arcade machine inspired game.

If you love Hook A Duck games at the amusement arcades or at funfairs, you will love Hook a Duck – Arcade Game!

In Hook a Duck – Arcade Game you don't actually hook any ducks! Instead you use your magnet to grab the ducks instead.

How To Play

You have 90 seconds to catch as many ducks as possible but be careful as them ducks are crafty and will duck under the water to be avoid be caught.

There are 4 different duck types each worth a set amount of points, bonuses can also be collected to help boost your score or get you extra time.

In Hook a Duck – Arcade Game is good fun for all the family along with the normal mode there is also an easy mode for toddlers and young children.

There is no Limit to the Amount of plays, no coins or credit to buy, just play as much as you like.
